templates.general: Admission to Sai Vidya Institute of Technology is based on CET (Common Entrance Test) and COMED-K (Consortium of Medical, Engineering and Dental Colleges of Karnataka) entrance examinations. The college offers various engineering programs including Computer Science, Electronics and Communication, Information Science, Mechanical, Civil Engineering, and specialized programs in AI/ML and Data Science. For detailed admission procedures, eligibility criteria, and important dates, please visit the college website or contact the admission office.
